title: Can't Gift a skin to someone on my friends list.  PLS FIX RIOT
body: RIOT, Your store is broken.  I tried to gift a skin to a friend of mine who plays Taric a lot, but it says I have not been friends long enough...He has been on my friends list for 4 years.  Does it have to be longer than 4 years or is your store just being stupid?

replies.body:
Hey kaimedar -

This should be resolved! Let me know if you're still having issues! :]

I'm having the same issue. I can't gift anyone on my friends list because of that exact error. 

Riot Respond please! :)
Oh, glad I am not the only one.  RIOT, Pls fix
